testcase.classname: To validate the Home page links in the Metallica site
testcase.name: Validate all the links navigates to page
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User click the links from header/footer section........................passed Then user directed to the appropriate pages.................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate the Home page links in the Metallica site
testcase.name: Validate the icons/images/links are clickable and navigate to the right page
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User click the icons/images/links......................................passed Then The icons/images/links are clickable and directed to the appropriate pages.passed

testcase.classname: To validate the Login functionality of Metallica application
testcase.name: Validate using valid credential in the login page
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User navigate to login page............................................passed Then User Enter valid email id and valid password in the login page.........passed

testcase.classname: To validate the Login functionality of Metallica application
testcase.name: Validate using Invalid credential in the login page
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User navigate to login page............................................passed Then Enter invalid credentials "Metallica1@gmail.com" and "metallica123"....passed

testcase.classname: To validate the Login functionality of Metallica application
testcase.name: Validate user is not able to create new account using already registered email address in the login page
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User navigate to login page............................................passed Then Click Create Account button............................................passed And User enter already existing email address in create account form and submit.passed

testcase.classname: To validate the Registration form in the Metallica application
testcase.name: Validate by entering the valid details in the Registration form
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User navigate to registration page.....................................passed And User entering all the required fields with valid information............passed Then User enter invalid values in the fields................................passed And The error message is displayed to enter valid information...............passed

testcase.classname: To validate the Registration form in the Metallica application
testcase.name: Validate the mandatory fields in the registration form
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User navigate to registration page.....................................passed And User click apply button without enter values in mandatory fields........passed Then Error message is displayed to fill the mandatory fields................passed
